mapper.insert: INSERT INTO temp_upload_file (upload_id, md5, user_id, file_name, enable) VALUES (#{uploadId}, #{md5}, #{userId}, #{fileName}, 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE upload_id = #{uploadId}, file_name = #{fileName}, enable = 0
mapper.select: SELECT file_name FROM temp_upload_file WHERE upload_id = #{uploadId} AND enable = 0
